Though I had no problem reading this file with VLC Media Player, Windows Media Player 9 or BSPlayer, I seriously doubt that it's XviD. I think it was made with a WMV video codec. If this is correct, it means that it is not MPEG4 and CAN'T be played on a standalone DVD player that supports DivX or XviD.
